data.comment: Today's referee, Leandro Pedro Vuaden, has blown to start the match.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 1, Fortaleza are pushing forward but Romarinho's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 6, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Morumbí.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
In the minute 8, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Dani Alves has run offside.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 14, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 21, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Sao Paulo Fortaleza's Paulao is caught offside.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 23, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 26, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Important block from the Sao Paulo defence as Yuri Cesar fires in a strike for Fortaleza.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 27, Jackson (Fortaleza) gets a yellow card.
Sao Paulo's Dani Alves misses with an attempt on goal.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 30, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In Sao Paulo, Osvaldo of Fortaleza is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felipe is back on his feet again.
In the minute 37, Felipe is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Pablo Felipe (Sao Paulo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Sao Paulo drives forward and Tche Tche gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Liziero gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
In the minute 43, Goal! Dani Alves gives Sao Paulo a 1-0 lead in Sao Paulo.
That's a fine assist from Reinaldo.
Osvaldo of Fortaleza smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick Fortaleza.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, In Sao Paulo, Jackson (Fortaleza) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Sao Paulo are coming forward and Pablo Felipe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Morumbí.
In the minute 47, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dani Alves of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 54, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Morumbí.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Fortaleza will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sao Paulo.
At Morumbí, Osvaldo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, Sao Paulo push forward at Morumbí and Dani Alves gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fortaleza defence.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 61, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In Sao Paulo Fortaleza attack through Romarinho. The finish is off target, however.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows against Fortaleza's Bruno Melo for offside.
In the minute 64, Romarinho (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 66, Sao Paulo's Dani Alves breaks free at Morumbí. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 67, Sao Paulo make their first substitution with Gabriel replacing Paulinho.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
In the minute 74, Free kick Fortaleza.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Fortaleza's Romarinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Gabriel Dias is replacing Osvaldo for the away team.
Franco Rodrigo Fragapane is replacing Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza at Morumbí.
In the minute 77, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pablo Felipe for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Jackson with Carlinhos.
Liziero for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Morumbí.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Gabriel is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, Bruno Alves (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Fortaleza's Juninho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Tche Tche for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Morumbí. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Pablo Felipe for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fortaleza's Franco Rodrigo Fragapane gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Sao Paulo Fortaleza's Franco Rodrigo Fragapane is caught offside.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a second substitution, with Luan replacing Liziero.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's fourth substitution at Morumbí with Mariano Vazquez replacing Romarinho.
